message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you.  Given its potential, I'm offering it at $9,500. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. Could we possibly negotiate the price down to $8,000?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but my product offers significant value. How about we meet in the middle at $9,000? This is a fair price considering the benefits it will bring you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I believe we can reach an agreement closer to my budget. Would $8,500 be acceptable?
